collection_methodology.selection_criteria: Top videos by view count per brand

quality_notes: All 193 videos have full English transcripts
Explicit brand comparison videos are rare in this category
Most content consists of single-brand reviews and tutorials
Transcripts contain implicit comparisons, trade-off discussions, and SWOT elements
30 videos flagged as comparison-focused based on search queries

phase_1_analysis: Use GPT-4 to extract implicit brand comparisons from all 193 transcripts
Identify trade-off discussions (adhesive strength vs damage, permanence vs removability, etc.)
Extract product SWOT elements from review content
Analyze competitive positioning mentions across transcripts
Cross-reference with 1,855 product reviews for comprehensive brand perception mapping
